title: Data Science Fresher (AI/ML)
description:
Join the Team at Pitangent Analytics & Software!

Position Summary

The entry-level position of Data Science Trainee (AI/ML) is integral for fresh graduates eager to pave their way into the realms of Artificial Intelligence (AI) and Machine Learning (ML). Here, you’ll be instrumental in crafting and delivering data-centric solutions that amplify our capabilities. By collaborating with seasoned data professionals, you’ll acquire essential hands-on experiences with diverse datasets and analytical techniques.

Your contributions are vital; you will engage in projects that utilize AI and ML to refine decision-making processes and bring forth creative solutions. This opportunity not only lays a robust groundwork in data science but also allows you to engage in impactful initiatives that resonate in the real world.

Main Duties


Help in gathering and refining both structured and unstructured datasets.
Apply statistical techniques to interpret data and confirm findings.
Develop machine learning algorithms aimed at resolving business challenges.
Work together with senior data scientists on interpretations and project specifications.
Visualize data findings using visualization tools like Matplotlib or Seaborn.
Take part in code evaluations and maintain code excellence.
Aid in the creation of documentation regarding data methodologies and processes.
Stay engaged in continuous learning about AI and ML advancements.
Provide input during collaborative team brainstorming sessions.
Assist with deploying models and keep track of performance indicators.
Conduct exploratory data analysis to unearth trends and insights.
Possess a solid understanding of statistical analysis techniques.
Familiarity with version control systems, specifically Git.
Exhibit strong problem-solving and analytical capabilities.
Communicate intricate technical topics effectively to non-technical audiences.
Display a genuine enthusiasm for developments in AI and ML.
Demonstrate meticulousness and a commitment to high standards of quality.
Ability to work both independently and as part of a collaborative team.
A strong willingness to learn new technologies and practices.
Basic knowledge of cloud services (AWS, Google Cloud) is an advantage.
Previous internship or project work in data science is a plus, though not essential.


Skills: python for data analysis,data visualization,artificial intelligence (ai),statistical analysis,machine learning,data preprocessing,git,problem solving,critical thinking,exploratory data analysis,machine learning (ml),data collection,data analysis,cloud platforms (aws, google cloud)
